and what they wanted to do was sell us a bus
ticket.
A really really overpriced bus ticket.

Normally a bus ticket is only 400 Baht from
Chiang Mai to Bangkok but they were trying
to sell it to us for 750 Baht.

They said no trains and only five seats left
